pageContext.claim: “No, they were trying to set up a meeting [with Iran's president] but he wanted sanctions lifted. And I said, "You must be kidding." We had no interest. Rouhani wanted a meeting at the UN. We did talk. I didn't speak to him personally, but our sides talked.”
pageContext.analysis: At the United Nations General Assembly, the French, acting as an intermediary, tried to arrange a phone call between the two leaders, but the Iranian leader refused to talk to Trump.
